title: "Deep Learning-Based Quantification of Pulmonary Hemosiderophages in Cytology Slides"
excerpt: "Exercise-induced pulmonary hemorrhage (EIPH) is a common condition in sport horses with negative impact on performance. Cytology of bronchoalveolar lavage fluid by use of a scoring system is considered the most sensitive diagnostic method."
